data.title: 'V1k1' by Tzang Merwyn Tong
data.meta_description: Singapore & Asian Film News Portal since 2006
data.text:
Production Talk – ‘V1k1’ by Tzang Merwyn Tong1 min read

Reading Time: < 1 minute

V1k1 is A Techno Fairytale is an indie Sci Fi Thriller set in a modern-day alternate universe. It tells the story of Gabriel, a human scientist and his obsession to prove the existence of fairies.

By accident, he captures one of them in his laboratory, and gets invited into a dimension beyond his dreams.

Hi Merwyn, what was the inspiration behind this film?

I have this idea that fairies could still be living among us. They existed in the time of Shakespeare, existed in folklore and in the minds of writers, why not in this modern world? If so, in what space, and what shape could they take the form of? And then I thought about the old Sci Fi films that I love.

Read the full story here >>

via SINdie
